name: Monster is coming
description:
My first Unity game.

The game is about a man who must collect as many treasures as possible. You control the man with the arrow-keys or WASD. Press space to jump. Press escape to go to the end screen.

The man gets damaged when he hits a cactus or is caught by the wolf. 

The wolf will speed up every time you find a treasure chest. If you don't find the chest within 10 seconds an arrow will appear and show you the way - but you will get more points if you find the chest before the arrow appears. You will also get more and more points as the wolf speeds up.

Future enhancements:

More levels.

Online highscores.
